channel.title: Posts on Hey Mom, I'm learning new things!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hey Mom, I'm learning new things!

item.title: Hello, World
item.author: antonioplacerda@gmail.com (Antonio P. Lacerda)
item.description: This is my first post. This is the beginning of something amazing. I’ve been wanting to give back to the community for a long time but didn’t know how to. Well, this is how I plan to start! I want to have a place where I put everything I learn, that is accessible everywhere and to everyone. No better place than here. I also wanted to create something hackable but not fully from scratch, since it would take longer than I’d like.
